>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.wq8dRJYQ58VZQuZU]{First Vanguard Aspect}

You control the natural entropy in your surroundings to bend and distort how it interacts with yourself and others.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.wtU2o6EVaVjwnuic]{Distortion Insight (Su)}: You gain @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.0Pq35gvSI2JlD682]{Improved Combat Maneuver} (trip) as a bonus feat and a +2 insight bonus to Stealth checks.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.JtSgZISjF2oLBU51]{Distortion Embodiment (Su)}: Once per combat, when you deal damage to a creature that has concealment, you can gain 1 Entropy Point without taking an additional action. If the creature has total concealment, you gain 2 Entropy Points.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.OsHHNdCM33VBlcsi]{Distortion Catalyst (Su)}: You and your allies within 30 feet gain concealment until the end of your next turn.

Improved: All allies within 30 feet gain concealment for 2 rounds.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.efkWv8cNnudgPrpY]{Distortion Finale (Su)}: You can spend 2 Entropy Points as a reaction to give your allies within 30 feet total concealment for 2 rounds.
